description: This file is a shell script that appears to handle device configuration retrieval and web configuration updates via curl commands, including certificate management and logging.

methods.name: echo_t
methods.description: A utility function for timestamped logging.

methods.name: getCpgConfig
methods.description: Fetches configuration from a specified config file and writes to a response file.

methods.name: getDeviceConfigFile
methods.description: Retrieves device configuration, handling certificates and static config fallback.

methods.name: runcURL
methods.description: Prepares and executes a curl request for web configuration, with retries and logging.
